scene.name: intro
scene.option: Going below deck to look at the maps.
You look like you're about to fall asleep.

scene.name: maps
scene.line: Maps, oh, yeah, I bet they've got a lot of them down here, um ...
Yeah you probably `need` maps to travel by boat.
`Myself`, uh, `personally` ... I don't use them. I read the signs, and I remember the roads, you know. Uh, landmarks. Or I ask for directions if I'm going somewhere I've never been before.
That's OK, to ask for directions. Remember that, kid. No shame in asking for directions.

scene.name: sleep
scene.line: Naw, I don't think I could ever sleep on a river.

You're right, though: it's been a long day. I should maybe find some coffee to go with all this beer ... or just move on up to the real stuff. Doesn't weigh you down as much, you know? Naw, of course you don't ...
Hey, what am I talking about? Who knows.
